thread.title: Jon Beason, Odell Beckham Jr., Dez Bryant, Victor Cruz, Greg Hardy do not practice Thursday | Cowboys-Giants injury report
thread.title_full: Jon Beason, Odell Beckham Jr., Dez Bryant, Victor Cruz, Greg Hardy do not practice Thursday | Cowboys-Giants injury report

author: James Kratch | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
title: Jon Beason, Odell Beckham Jr., Dez Bryant, Victor Cruz, Greg Hardy do not practice Thursday | Cowboys-Giants injury report
text:
Comments 
EAST RUTHERFORD â€” The Cowboys and Giants could start to put together a pretty good roster based on the names that appeared on their respective injury reports Thursday. 
The Giants were without wide receiver Odell Beckham Jr. (hamstring) , wide receiver Victor Cruz (calf) and linebacker Jon Beason (knee) on Thursday, while the Cowboys had defensive end Greg Hardy (illness) and wide receiver Dez Bryant (foot) miss practice ahead of Sunday's critical NFC East showdown at MetLife Stadium. 
Beckham is expected to play Sunday. Hardy was a full participant in Wednesday's practice, so he will likely be available as well. Bryant worked on the side during Thursday's session, according to reports from Dallas-area reporters, and is considered a longshot to make his return from a broken foot against the Giants. Beason's status for Sunday is unknown. Cruz will miss his seventh straight game Sunday barring a miraculous series of events. Odell Beckham teaching Rueben Randle to do Odell Beckham things Giants wide receiver Odell Beckham appears to be teaching fellow Giants WR Rueben Randle how to do Odell Beckham things during practice Thursday. 
Here is the Giants' complete injury report after Thursday's practice (Cowboys to follow):
